title: Abbey Clancy wows in leather trouser suit at fashion event... four months after giving birth
text:
She welcomed her the birth of her fourth child, a baby boy called Jack, back in June.

And Abbey Clancy, 33, showcased her incredible post-baby body on Wednesday, when she stepped out in style for the British Fashion Council Designer Pop-up opening lunch at popular Oxfordshire outlet shopping centre Bicester Village.

The model, who is married to former footballer Peter Crouch, 38, looked sensational as she arrived at the event in a chic brown leather trouser suit.

Fine dining: Abbey Clancy attended the British Fashion Council Designer Pop-up opening lunch at popular Oxfordshire outlet shopping centre Bicester Village on Wednesday

Standing tall in a pair of black leather boots, the stunning Liverpudlian teamed her sleek ensemble with a plain black top.

Shielding her eyes from the autumn sunshine with a pair of oversized sunglasses, the mother-of-four wore her golden locks in a relaxed wavy bun.

She was joined at the intimate event by a host of fashion and lifestyle influencers, as well as Rosie Fortescue, Tess Ward and Real Housewives Of Cheshire's Missé Beqiri.

Chic: The model, who is married to former footballer Peter Crouch, 38, looked sensational as she arrived at the event in a chic brown leather trouser suit

The BFC Designer Pop-up, which returns to Bicester Village for a second year, showcases 30 UK designer businesses which have been curated by the British Fashion Council and represent the country's creative and innovative talent.

The pop-up offers a platform for exposure to fledgling designers, many of whom have never traded in boutiques before, as well as an introduction for established British brands to the Collection’s international guests.

Abbey's outing came just hours after her friend Coleen Rooney, 33, sparked a very public feud with fellow WAG Rebekah Vardy, 37.

Familiar faces: She rubbed shoulders with a host of familiar faces, including Rosie Fortescue

Ensemble: Standing tall in a pair of black leather boots, the stunning Liverpudlian teamed her sleek ensemble with a plain black top

Coleen took to social media to reveal she had suspected someone close to her had been betraying her for years and admitted she'd planted false Instagram stories on her private page to catch the person in question - who she named as Rebekah.

The claim has drawn attention to Coleen's small circle of followers on her private Instagram account - less than 400 in total.

As well as her and husband Wayne Rooney's relatives, her inner circle of trust, includes fellow WAGs - Abbey, Danielle Lloyd and Dawn Ward.

The trio make up some of the star's 367 followers on her private Instagram account, reserved for her closest friends who she trusts.

Stylish: At one point, she was seen trying on a stylish black ensemble after browsing the racks

Abbey, a fellow Liverpudlian, is married to former footballer Peter Crouch, and has been friends with Coleen for years.

Although the duo are rarely seen out together, they are nothing but supportive on social media and constantly comment on each other's milestones.

And while a number of celebrities have publicly weighed in on Coleen's shocking claims, Abbey has yet to wade into the row on social media.

Abbey and husband Peter Crouch welcomed their fourth child Jack four months ago, and also share daughters Sophia, eight, Liberty, four, and son Johnny, 20 months.

Having a chat: She was spotted having a chat with Real Housewives Of Chashire's Missé Beqiri

Peter announced the birth of their child on social media: 'Our beautiful baby boy was born Monday 3rd June mother and baby Divock Samrat Crouch are doing well.'

He later added: 'Our boy is beautiful the name is still to be clarified unfortunately Abs not going for Divock Samrat.'

After joking the nickname had 'stuck' a little over the weeks, the sportsman finally shared the update on the latest addition to the Crouch family in his column for the Daily Mail.

Peter wrote: 'We have just welcomed our fourth child, Jack, into the family and the wonderful chaos that comes with a new baby means it hasn't really hit me that I haven't gone back for pre-season training. Life is hectic in a brilliant way.'

Accusations: Abbey's outing came hours after her friend Coleen Rooney (front) accused fellow WAG Rebekah Vardy (back) of leaking stories about her
